      class Doc {
    
    constructor(username, token) {
        this.username = username;
        this.token = token;
        this.current_subject = null;
        this.current_chapter = null;
        this.current_topic = null;
        this.user_data = null;
        this.current_subject_changes = 0;
        this.initUserRepo();
    }

    async initUserRepo() {
        const { UserRepo } = await import('./allModule/userRepo.js');
        this.userRepo = new UserRepo(this.username, this.token,this);
        this.init();       
    }

    async test() {
        // click('#testBtn')
        // click('#openBtn')
        // get('#prompt-offcanvas-hide-btn').click()
    }

    async init(retries = 3) {
        this.showStatus('...checking repositories');
        addBottomLoading('#nav', 'once');

        let repo_result = await this.userRepo.checkRequirement();
        if (!repo_result) {
            this.showStatus('failed to load repositories');
            removeBottomLoading('#nav');
            this.showStatus('...reloading');
            if (retries > 0) {
                setTimeout(async () => this.init(retries - 1),1500);
            } else {
                this.showStatus('failed to load repositories');
                removeBottomLoading('#nav');
                return;
            }
        }

        this.showStatus('...checking userdata');
        let userData = await this.userRepo.getFile('user.json');
        if (!userData) {
            this.showStatus('failed to load userdata, reloading');
            removeBottomLoading('#nav');
            setTimeout(() => click('#page-reload-btn'),1500);
            return;
        }

        this.showStatus('repositories loaded');
        this.user_data = JSON.parse(base64ToUtf8(userData.content));

        this.showUserDetails();
        this.showSubjectList();

        this.newSubjectHandler();
        this.newChapterHandler();

        this.subjectRenameHandler();
        this.chapterRenameHandler();
        this.topicRenameHandler();

        this.subjectDeleteHandler();
        this.chapterDeleteHandler();
        this.topicDeleteHandler();

        this.handleReload();
        this.handleMediaManager(this.userRepo);
        this.modalContentHandler();
        this.initContentCreating();
        this.saveContentHandler();
        this.handleEventDelegation();
        this.handleContentShare();
        this.showUserHistory()
    }

    async initModule(folder, module_name, isAsync, ...args) {
        const mod = await import(`./${folder}/${module_name}.js`);
        if (isAsync) { return await mod[module_name](...args); }
        else { return mod[module_name](...args); }
    }

    async handleMediaManager(noteObj) {
        const mod = await import('./allModule/mediaHandler.js');
        mod.initMediaManager(noteObj);
    }

    async showUserDetails(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'show_user_details', false, this);
    }

    async showUserHistory(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'show_user_history', false, this);
    }

    async showSubjectList(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'show_subject_list', true, this);
    }

    async showChapter(subject_name, target_chapter_name, target_topic_name){
        return  await this.initModule('doc_module', 'show_chapter', true, this, subject_name, target_chapter_name, target_topic_name); 
    }

    async newSubjectHandler(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'new_subject_handler', true, this); 
    }

    async newChapterHandler(){
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'new_chapter_handler', false, this); 
    }

    async newTopicHandler(topicTitle, acrItem){ await this.initModule('doc_module', 'new_topic_handler', false, this, topicTitle, acrItem); 
    }

    async subjectRenameHandler(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'subject_rename_handler', true, this); 
    }

    async chapterRenameHandler(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'chapter_rename_handler', false, this);
    }

    async topicRenameHandler(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'topic_rename_handler', false, this);
    }

    async subjectDeleteHandler(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'subject_delete_handler', true, this);
    }

    async chapterDeleteHandler(){
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'chapter_delete_handler', false, this);
    }

    async topicDeleteHandler(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'topic_delete_handler', false, this);
    }

    async updateUserData(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'update_user_data', true, this); 
    }

    async updateSubject(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'update_subject', true, this);
    }

    async handleReload(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'handle_reload', false, this);
    }

    async handleSearchResult(subject_name, chapter_name, topic_name){
    await this.initModule('doc_module', 'handle_search_result', true, this, subject_name, chapter_name, topic_name); 
    }

    async handleContentShare(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'handle_content_share', true, this);
    }

    async handleSearch(val) { 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'handle_search', false, this, val);
    }

    async handleEventDelegation(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'handle_event_delegation', true, this);
     }

    async saveContentHandler(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'save_content_handler', true, this); 
    }

    async modalContentHandler(){ 
        await this.initModule('doc_module', 'modal_content_handler', false, this); 
    }


    async initContentCreating() {
        await this.initModule('allModule', 'init_content_creating', false, this);   
    }


    increase_sub_changes() {
        this.current_subject_changes++;
        show('#subject-changes-counter');
        text('#subject-changes-counter', this.current_subject_changes);
    }

    updatePageAddress(title) {
        if (!title) return;
        document.title = title;
    }

    autoEdit(element, callback) {
        attr(element, 'contenteditable', 'true');
        element.focus();

        Trigger(element, 'blur', () => {
            element.removeAttribute('contenteditable');
            callback(stdText(text(element)));
        });

        Trigger(element, 'keydown', (e) => {
            if (e.key == 'Enter') {
                e.preventDefault();
                element.removeAttribute('contenteditable');
            }
        });
    }

    showToast(msg, icon) {
        let toast = get('#liveToast');
        if (!msg) return;
        text(get(toast, '.toast-msg'), msg);
        if (icon) {
            let toastIcon = get(toast, '.toast-icon');
            toastIcon.className = '';
            toastIcon.classList.add('fa-solid', `fa-${icon}`, 'fs-5', 'me-2', 'toast-icon');
        }
        get('#liveToastBtn').click();
    }

    showStatus(msg, autohide) {
        let msg_text = msg ? msg : ' ';
        let statusbar = get('#statusBar');
        text(statusbar, msg_text);
        if (autohide !== true) return;
        setTimeout(() => text(statusbar, ''), 1300);
    }




}

window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const username = attr(document.body, 'data-username');
    const token = attr(document.body, 'data-token');
    if (username === 'guest') {
        return;
    }
    new Doc(username, token);
});

Headers: entries() method

Note:This  feature is available in webworker

The Headers.entries() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all key/value pairs contained in this object. Both the key and value of each pair are String objects.

syntax
      

      
js

      
      

      entries()
parameter

none
unsaved

      /* GitHub Dark Theme Color Codes */
body, body[data-theme='dark'] {
    --body-bg:#0d1117; /* GitHub dark background color */
    --box-bg: #1f262e; /* GitHub dark box background */
    --box-bg-1: #1b2129; /* Slightly lighter dark */
    --box-bg-2: #1f262f; /* Consistent with body-bg */
    --body-font-color: #c9d1d9; /* GitHub text color */
    --bs-heading-color: #e9ecef; /* GitHub heading color */
    --border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); /* GitHub border color */
    --box-hover-bg: #21262c; /* Hover effect background */
    --hover-bg: #21262c; /* Same as box-hover-bg */
    --body-font-light-color: #8b949e; /* Light font color */
    --scrollbar-bg: #30363d; /* Scrollbar background */
    --scrollbar-thumb-bg: #8b949e; /* Scrollbar thumb color */
    --placeholder-bg: #30363d; /* Placeholder background */
    --card-bg: #161b22; /* Card background color */
    --card-header-bg: #161b22; /* Card header background */
    --card-footer-bg: #161b22; /* Card footer background */
    --bs-dropdown-bg: #161b22; /* Dropdown background color */
    --bs-dropdown-color: #c9d1d9; /* Dropdown text color */
    --offcanvas-bg: #13171e; /* Offcanvas background color */
    --offcanvas-body-bg: #0d1117; /* Offcanvas body background */
    --nav-bg:#0d1117;
    --popover-bg: #161b22; /* Popover background color */
    --popover-color: #c9d1d9; /* Popover text color */
    --popover-header-bg: #30363d; /* Popover header background */
    --popover-body-bg: #161b22; /* Popover body background */
    --modal-bg: #0d1117; /* Modal background color */
    --modal-header-bg: #161b22; /* Modal header background */
    --dropdown-menu-bg: #161b22; /* Dropdown menu background */
    --dropdown-item-hover-bg: #30363d; /* Dropdown item hover background */
    --accordion-item-bg: #161b22; /* Accordion item background */
    --accordion-collapse-bg: #0d1117; /* Accordion collapse background */
    --form-control-bg: #161b22; /* Form control background */
    --form-control-placeholder-color: #8b949e; /* Form control placeholder color */
    --btn-light-bg: #161b22; /* Light button background */
    --code-header-bg:#252e37;
    --code-bg:#1f262e;    
    --code-color: #c9d1d9; /* Code text color */
    --code-link-bg: #1f262e; /* Code link background */
    --tab-content-bg: #0d1117; /* Tab content background */
    --body-font-weight: 400; /* Font weight */
    --btn-font-weight: 500; /* Button font weight */
    --link-color: #58a6ff; /* Link color */
    --link-hover-color: #79c0ff; /* Link hover color */
    --toast-bg: #161b22; /* Toast background color */
    --toast-header-bg: #30363d; /* Toast header background */
    --element-container-bg: #161b22; /* Element container background */
    --tab-bg: #161b22; /* Tab background color */
    --prompt-btn-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); /* Prompt button background */
    --default-highlight-bg: #30363d; /* Default highlight background */
    --tab-btn-active-color: #56d364; /* Tab button active color */
    --table-bg: #161b22; /* Table background color */
    --table-active-bg:#181f24; /* Table active background */
}
